Name: The Pneumadrunk Beast
Description: Once a Warlock, the Pneuma swarming the area has corrupted them into a dense being of strangely colored flesh and muscle, pulsating with power and color. All thoughts are gone except for one- kill everything that moves.
AttackCards: Heartpiercing Brutality | Strides 12 Squares towards the healthiest enemy and Strikes twice at +2 to hit and +2 to crit range for 20 Pierce. For each hit, reduce the victim's Strides by 3 for a round.

Burning Sharpness | Strike all enemies in Starbust 2 of me at +4 to my Curse Die size for 19 Slash. Then, Strike the most damaged enemy within Starburst 10 for 15 Burn, dealing 6 Burn on a Secondary Success.

Ruinous Cunning | Stride 8 Squares to get into Melee with as many enemies as possible, then performs Endless Hatred.
**Endless Hatred**: Stride up to 3 Squares towards the closest enemy, then Strike an enemy for 17 Rend. If this hits, I repeat this action again ignoring Multi-Attack Penalty.

Pneuma Vampirism | Stride 5 Squares up to twice to get into Melee with as many enemies as possible, then Strikes all enemies within Starburst 2 for 15 Pierce at +1 to hit for every 30 damage I've taken. Icrease the damage by 6 for each Stride I didn't use. I heal for all damage dealt.

Pneuma Overload | Strike every enemy for 30 - X Burn, where X is the number of Squares between us doubling X if Line of Sight is broken. Destroy all terrain within Starbust 4 of me. I suffer 10 damage.
